alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Morton; Stanton (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued December 26 at 12:39AM CST until December 26 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...Strong Southwest Winds Sunday Afternoon... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON CST /11 AM MST/ TODAY TO 6 PM CST /5 PM MST/ THIS EVENING FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 061...074 AND 084... * Affected Area...In Kansas...Fire Weather Zone 061 Hamilton... Fire Weather Zone 074 Stanton and Fire Weather Zone 084 Morton. * Winds...Southwest 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * Timing...Sunday Afternoon * Relative Humidity...As low as 14 percent. * Temperatures...In the mid 60s. * Impacts...Any fires that start will have extreme fire behavior and spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not advised.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now....or will shortly. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
